metadata.title: CVE-2018-1054 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory read flaw was found in the way 389-ds-base handledcertain LDAP search filters, affecting all versions including 1.4.x. Aremote, unauthenticated attacker could potentially use this flaw to makens-slapd crash via a specially crafted LDAP request, thus resulting indenial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
